application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Chestnut - 3m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points, crown lift to 5m from ground level & deadwood.T.2 Yew - Crown lift to 3m from ground level all round & 2.5m Lateral reduction over road shaping into remaining crown sympathetically.T.3 Lime - Repollard to approx. 5m from ground level.T.4 Ash - 2-2.5m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.5 Plum - Crown lift to 2m from ground level all round.G1 Ash & Elder - Fell.G.2 Sycamores - 3m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & deadwood.G.3 Ash - 3-4m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & deadwood.
decision_conditions: Please note that the above permission has been re-issued to include additional works to T.2 Yew which had been applied for but were absent from the previous decision notice due to an error. This new permission now supercedes the Decision Notice previously issued on 09/02/2023 and does not allow for a second occurrance of the same works.
